title: Head of Outreach
description: As the Outreach Team, we are the storytellers of the CDS. We tell the stories that help public servants improve government services and make people’s lives better. But, we don't just tell feel-good stories. The problems we tackle are complex, and so are the stories we tell. We are not afraid to talk about what worked, what didn't, and how we can do it better. There are no villains in the stories we tell - we’re committed to understanding everyone’s needs and working through problems with them. If you’re ready to bring an open and personal voice to government then this is the role for you.
